Re: Time Line!

AWESOME!

Also what you have along is the Predacons are a r=
epressed class and second clas citizerns on their own planet.  The Maximal =
High Council is internally repressive and paranoid of another war, and expe=
riments on their own citizens and law enforcement.

What you can say is it'=
s the intiial stages of the loop we see in many Transofrmers media where th=
e Autobot repression gives rise to the corruption that the Decepticons use =
as an impetus to rise ot power.  Whether the castes of Transformers: Prime =
and the Exodus novel, or the Marvel US nad UK comics, or referenced in the =
Allspark ALmanac.  

So, things are very grey and grey.  The Predacons have=
 many justified grievances, and the Maximals are engaged in a degree of cor=
ruption adn repression of thier own people, and are far from perfect.  So y=
ou can say it's the drive of the TRANSFORMERS all over again.
